ExportStepsRiverNetworkPecs.Sql: CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS pec AS SELECT CAST( strftime( '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours' ) ) AS TEXT ) AS time, CAST( strftime( '%Y', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours' ) ) AS INTEGER ) AS year, CAST( strftime( '%m', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER ) AS month, CAST( strftime( '%d', datetime('$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER) AS day, CAST( strftime( '%H', datetime('$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER ) AS hour, CAST(`space/reach`.`ExportStepsRiverNetworkReaches/Reaches` AS INTEGER) AS reach, CAST(`ExportStepsRiverNetworkPecs/PEC_SW` AS REAL) AS pec, CAST('ug/l' AS TEXT) AS unit FROM `time/hour, space/base_geometry` JOIN `space/reach` ON `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.j = `space/reach`.i

ExportCmfContinuousPecs.Sql: CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS pec AS SELECT CAST( strftime( '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours' ) ) AS TEXT ) AS time, CAST( strftime( '%Y', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours' ) ) AS INTEGER ) AS year, CAST( strftime( '%m', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER ) AS month, CAST( strftime( '%d', datetime('$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER) AS day, CAST( strftime( '%H', datetime('$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER ) AS hour, CAST(`space/reach`.`ExportCmfContinuousReaches/Reaches` AS INTEGER) AS reach, CAST(`ExportCmfContinuousPecs/PEC_SW` AS REAL) AS pec, CAST('ug/l' AS TEXT) AS unit FROM `time/hour, space/base_geometry` JOIN `space/reach` ON `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.j = `space/reach`.i

ExportCascadeToxswaPecs.Sql: CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS pec AS SELECT CAST( strftime( '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours' ) ) AS TEXT ) AS time, CAST( strftime( '%Y', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours' ) ) AS INTEGER ) AS year, CAST( strftime( '%m', datetime( '$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER ) AS month, CAST( strftime( '%d', datetime('$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER) AS day, CAST( strftime( '%H', datetime('$(SimulationStart)', `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.i || ' hours', '1 hours') ) AS INTEGER ) AS hour, CAST(`space/reach`.`ExportCascadeToxswaReaches/hydrography_id` AS INTEGER) AS reach, CAST(`ExportCascadeToxswaPecs/ConLiqWatTgtAvgHrAvg` AS REAL) AS pec, CAST('ug/l' AS TEXT) AS unit FROM `time/hour, space/base_geometry` JOIN `space/reach` ON `time/hour, space/base_geometry`.j = `space/reach`.i

ExportStepsRiverNetworkLP50Species1SD.Sql: CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS `lp50_$(Species1)_SD` AS SELECT CAST(strftime('%Y', datetime('$(SimulationStart)', `time/year, space/base_geometry`.i || ' years')) AS INTEGER) AS year, CAST(`space/reach`.`ExportStepsRiverNetworkReaches/Reaches` AS INTEGER) AS reach, CAST(CASE WHEN `ExportStepsRiverNetworkLP50Species1SD/LP50` < 0 THEN NULL ELSE `ExportStepsRiverNetworkLP50Species1SD/LP50` END AS REAL) AS lp50 FROM `time/year, space/base_geometry` JOIN `space/reach` ON `time/year, space/base_geometry`.j = `space/reach`.i
